column1: Key                                                                    Action
Ctrl+M                                                                 Open new window
Ctrl+Shift+M or Windows+Alt+N                                          Open small window to create side note
Ctrl+Alt+D                                                             Dock the window
Ctrl+Z                                                                 Undo the last action
Ctrl+Y                                                                 Redo the last action
Ctrl+A                                                                 Select all items on the current page
Ctrl+X                                                                 Cut the selected text or item
Ctrl+C                                                                 Copy the selected text or item to the Clipboard
Ctrl+V                                                                 Paste the contents of the Clipboard
Home                                                                   Move to the beginning of the line
End                                                                    Move to the end of the line
Left Arrow                                                             Move one character to the left
Right Arrow                                                            Move one character to the right
Ctrl+Left Arrow                                                        Move one word to the left
Ctrl+Right Arrow                                                       Move one word to the right
Backspace                                                              Delete one character to the left
Delete                                                                 Delete one character to the right
Ctrl+Backspace                                                         Delete one word to the left
Ctrl+Delete                                                            Delete one word to the right
Shift+Enter                                                            Insert line break without starting new paragraph
F7                                                                     Check spelling
Shift+F7                                                               Open the thesaurus for selected word
Shift+F10                                                              Bring up the context menu
Ctrl+Shift+W                                                           Execute the action suggested
Ctrl+Shift+H or Ctrl+Alt+H                                             Highlight selected text
Ctrl+K                                                                 Insert link
Ctrl+Shift+C                                                           Copy the formatting of selected text (Format Painter)
Ctrl+Shift+V                                                           Paste the formatting to selected text (Format Painter)
Enter                                                                  Open link (cursor in link text)
Ctrl+B                                                                 Apply or remove bold formatting from the selected text
Ctrl+I                                                                 Apply or remove italic formatting from the selected text
Ctrl+U                                                                 Apply or remove the underline from the selected text
Ctrl+Hyphen                                                            Apply or remove strikethrough from the selected text
Ctrl+Shift+=                                                           Apply or remove superscript formatting from the selected text
Ctrl+=                                                                 Apply or remove subscript formatting from the selected text
Ctrl+Period                                                            Apply or remove bulleted list formatting from the selected paragraph
Ctrl+Slash                                                             Apply or remove numbered list formatting from the selected paragraph
Ctrl+Alt+1                                                             Apply Heading 1 style to the current note
Ctrl+Alt+2                                                             Apply Heading 2 style to the current note
Ctrl+Alt+3                                                             Apply Heading 3 style to the current note
Ctrl+Alt+4                                                             Apply Heading 4 style to the current note
Ctrl+Alt+5                                                             Apply Heading 5 style to the current note
Ctrl+Alt+6                                                             Apply Heading 6 style to the current note
Ctrl+Shift+N                                                           Apply the Normal style to the current note
Alt+Shift+Right Arrow                                                  Indent paragraph from the left
Alt+Shift+Left Arrow                                                   Remove paragraph indent from the left
Ctrl+R                                                                 Right-align the selected paragraph
Ctrl+L                                                                 Left-align the selected paragraph
Ctrl+Shift+>                                                           Increase the font size of selected text
Ctrl+Shift+<                                                           Decrease the font size of selected text
Ctrl+Shift+N                                                           Clear all formatting applied to the selected text
Ctrl+Shift+R                                                           Show or hide rule lines on the current page
Alt+N
column2: F                                                               Insert document or file on the current page

column1: Alt+N
column2: O                                                               Insert file as printout on the current page

column1: Alt+Shift+P                                                            Show or hide document printouts on current page
Alt+N
Alt+N
column2: S                                                               Insert picture from scanner or camera

column1: Windows logo key+Shift+S                                               Insert screen clipping (when OneNote Active)
Alt+Shift+D                                                            Insert the current date
Alt+Shift+F                                                            Insert the current date and time
Alt+Shift+T                                                            Insert the current time
Shift+Enter                                                            Insert line break
Alt+=                                                                  Start math equation or convert selected text to math equation
Ctrl+Alt+E                                                             Insert Euro (???) symbol
Tab                                                                    Create table by adding second column to already typed text
Tab                                                                    Create another column in table with single row
Enter                                                                  Create row at end of table cell
Ctrl+Enter                                                             Create row below the current row in table
Alt+Enter                                                              Create another paragraph in the same cell in table
Ctrl+Alt+R                                                             Create column to the right of the current column in table
Enter                                                                  Create row above (cursor at beginning of row)
DEL (press twice)                                                      Delete empty row (cursor at beginning of row)
Ctrl+A                                                                 Select all items on page
Shift+End                                                              Select to the end of the line
Shift+Down Arrow                                                       Select the whole line (cursor at beginning of row)
Ctrl+Shift+T                                                           Jump to the title of the page and select it
Esc                                                                    Cancel the selected outline or page
Alt+Shift+Up Arrow                                                     Move paragraphs up
Alt+Shift+Down Arrow                                                   Move paragraphs down
Alt+Shift+Left Arrow                                                   Move paragraphs left (decreasing the indent)
Alt+Shift+Right Arrow                                                  Move paragraphs right (increasing the indent)
Ctrl+Shift+Hyphen                                                      Select the current paragraph and its subordinate paragraphs
Delete                                                                 Delete the selected note or object
Home                                                                   Move to the beginning of the line
End                                                                    Move to the end of the line
Left Arrow                                                             Move one character to the left
Right Arrow                                                            Move one character to the right
Alt+Left Arrow                                                         Go back to the last page visited
Alt+Right Arrow                                                        Go forward to the next page visited
Ctrl+Alt+P or Ctrl+Alt+S                                               Start playback of selected audio or video recording
Ctrl+Alt+Y                                                             Rewind the current audio or video recording by few seconds
Ctrl+Alt+U                                                             Fast-forward the current audio or video recording by few seconds
Ctrl+1                                                                 Apply
column3: or clear the To Do tag

column1: Ctrl+2                                                                 Apply or clear the Important tag
Ctrl+3                                                                 Apply or clear the Question tag

Ctrl+5                                                                 Apply or clear the Definition tag
Ctrl+6                                                                 Apply or clear custom tag
Ctrl+7                                                                 Apply or clear custom tag
Ctrl+8                                                                 Apply or clear custom tag
Ctrl+9                                                                 Apply or clear custom tag
Ctrl+0                                                                 Remove all note tags from the selected notes
Alt+Shift+1                                                            Show through Level 1
Alt+Shift+2                                                            Expand to Level 2
Alt+Shift+3                                                            Expand to Level 3
Alt+Shift+4                                                            Expand to Level 4
Alt+Shift+5                                                            Expand to Level 5
Alt+Shift+6                                                            Expand to Level 6
Alt+Shift+7                                                            Expand to Level 7
Alt+Shift+8                                                            Expand to Level 8
Alt+Shift+9                                                            Expand to Level 9
Alt+Shift+0                                                            Expand all levels
Tab                                                                    Increase indent by one level
Shift+Tab                                                              Decrease indent by one level
Alt+Shift+Plus Sign                                                    Expand collapsed outline
Alt+Shift+Minus Sign                                                   Collapse an expanded outline
Ctrl+Left Shift                                                        Set writing direction left to right
Ctrl+Right Shift                                                       Set writing direction right to left
Tab                                                                    Increase indent by one level in right-to-left text
Shift+Tab                                                              Decrease indent by one level in right-to-left text
F11                                                                    Enable or disable full page view
Ctrl+M                                                                 Open new window
Ctrl+Shift+M                                                           Open small window to create side note
Ctrl+Shift+*                                                           Expand or collapse the tabs of page group
Ctrl+P                                                                 Print the current page
Ctrl+N                                                                 Add new page at the end of the selected section
Ctrl+Shift+[                                                           Increase the width of the page tabs bar
Ctrl+Shift+]                                                           Decrease the width of the page tabs bar
Ctrl+Alt+N                                                             Create new page below the current page tab at the same level
Ctrl+Alt+[                                                             Decrease indent level of the current page tab label
Ctrl+Alt+]                                                             Increase indent level of the current page tab label
Ctrl+Shift+Alt+N                                                       Create new subpage below the current page
Ctrl+A                                                                 Select all items (or all page in group)
Ctrl+Shift+A                                                           Select the current page
Alt+Shift+Up Arrow                                                     Move the selected page tab up
Alt+Shift+Down Arrow                                                   Move the selected page tab down
Ctrl+Shift+T                                                           Move the insertion point to the page title
Alt+PAGE Up                                                            Go to the first page in the currently visible set of page tabs
Alt+PAGE Down                                                          Go to the last page in the currently visible set of page tabs
PAGE Up                                                                Scroll up in the current page
PAGE Down                                                              Scroll down in the current page
Ctrl+Home                                                              Scroll to the top of the current page
Ctrl+End                                                               Scroll to the bottom of the current page
Ctrl+Down Arrow                                                        Go to the next paragraph
Ctrl+Up Arrow                                                          Go to the previous paragraph
Alt+Down Arrow                                                         Go to the next note container
Home                                                                   Go to the beginning of the line
End                                                                    Go to the end of the line
Left Arrow                                                             Move one character to the left
Right Arrow                                                            Move one character to the right
Alt+Left Arrow                                                         Go back to the last page visited
Alt+Right Arrow                                                        Go forward to the next page visited
Alt+Ctrl+Plus Sign (on the numeric keypad) or Alt+Ctrl+Shift+Plus Sign Zoom in
Alt+Ctrl+Minus Sign (on the numeric keypad) or Alt+Ctrl+Shift+Hyphen   Zoom out
Ctrl+S                                                                 Save changes
Windows+Shift+N                                                        Open OneNote
Ctrl+O                                                                 Open notebook
Windows+N                                                              Send to OneNote Tool
Ctrl+T                                                                 Create new section
Ctrl+Alt+Shift+O                                                       Open section
Ctrl+Tab                                                               Go to the next section
Ctrl+Shift+Tab                                                         Go to the previous section
Ctrl+PAGE Down                                                         Go to the next page in the section
Ctrl+PAGE Up                                                           Go to the previous page in the section

Alt+End                                                                Go to the last page in the section
Alt+PAGE Up                                                            Go to the first page in the currently visible set of page tabs
Alt+PAGE Down                                                          Go to the last page of the currently visible set of page tabs
Ctrl+Alt+M                                                             Move or copy the current page
Ctrl+Alt+G                                                             Put focus on the current page tab
Ctrl+SHFT+A                                                            Select the current page tab
Ctrl+Shift+G                                                           Put focus on the current section tab
Ctrl+Shift+G

column3: Enter                     Switch to different notebook on the Navigation bar

Down Arrow                                                             While searching all notebooks
Enter                                                                  While searching all notebooks

column1: Ctrl+E
Alt+O after searching                                                  Open the Search Results pane
Ctrl+F                                                                 Search only the current page
Enter or F3                                                            While searching the current page
Shift+F3                                                               While searching the current page
Esc                                                                    Dismiss Search and return to the page
Ctrl+Shift+E                                                           Send selected pages as email
Ctrl+Shift+E                                                           Send the selected pages as email
Ctrl+Shift+1                                                           Create Today Outlook task from selected note
Ctrl+Shift+2                                                           Create Tomorrow Outlook task from selected note
Ctrl+Shift+3                                                           Create This Week Outlook task from selected note
Ctrl+Shift+4                                                           Create Next Week Outlook task from selected note

F9                                                                     Sync changes in all shared notebooks
